name: Enchell
description:
This game was made by 2 people:

NonRidiculousAdjective - Art and Code

CNR - (great) Music and Level Design  -https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmBPt_6Jq_0hFEG1o6gwnOQ

NonRidiculousAdjective  (part of the team of Quasar Game Studios) also works on his own bigger projects, so check out our channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCajlIhxlG1J_VotX1HH9l4g?view_as=subscriber

Known bugs

let yourself die the first time in the game, because it starts at wave 4, after the death, the wave counter just resets back to wave 1
